application.name: Strawberry Music Player
application.summary: An audio player and music collection organizer

description.p: Strawberry is a audio player and music collection organizer. It is a fork of Clementine. The name is inspired by the band Strawbs.

ul.li: Supports WAV, FLAC, WavPack, DSF, DSDIFF, Ogg Vorbis, Speex, MPC, TrueAudio, AIFF, MP4, MP3 and ASF
Advanced output and device options with support for bit perfect playback on Linux
Album cover art from Last.fm, Musicbrainz and Discogs
Song lyrics from AudD and API Seeds
Transfer music to iPod, iPhone, MTP or mass-storage USB player
